column4: Pre-workshop survey: What is the operating system that you will use during the course (on your laptop)?
column5: Pre-workshop survey: Which version of operating system are you using? If your operating system is Linux, which distribution are you using? This will help us to create more targeted installation instructions.

column8: Pre-workshop survey: Are you using automated testing in your programming project(s)?

column19: I have been using Matlab for my time in university, but now as a PhD student looking into machine learning and adaptive filtering I want to use Python do to the large community in machine learning especially.     I feel a bit lost when it comes to Git and GitHub and also regarding the work flow of python (using Atom IDE atm).     Would be nice to get a firm grip on a proper work flow including documentation, and how to use Git properly.    Also interested in tips on code development and testing.
